title: Handling ‘Happy’ vs ‘Not Happy’: Better sentiment analysis with sentimentr
excerpt: Sentiment Analysis is one of the most obvious things Data Analysts with unlabelled Text data (with no score or no rating) end up doing in an attempt to extract some insights out of it and the same Sentiment analysis is also one of the potential research areas for any NLP (Natural Language Processing) enthusiasts.
